'''Bosco Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Bosco was born in {{SR|1167}}, the son of [[Buffo Boffin]] and [[Ivy Goodenough]]. He had one son, [[Otto Boffin|Otto]], who was born in {{SR|1212}}. Bosco died in {{SR|1258}}.<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
